definitions.definition: Used to show disagreement, negation, denial, refusal, or prohibition.
examples: No , you may not watch television now.

definitions.definition: Used to show agreement with a negative question.
examples: "Don’t you like milk?" " No ." (i.e., "No, I don’t like milk.")

definitions.definition: Used together with an affirmative word or phrase to show agreement.

main_definition: Used to show disagreement, negation, denial, refusal, or prohibition.
secondary_definitions: Used to show agreement with a negative question.
( colloquial ) Used together with an affirmative word or phrase to show agreement.
